website_summaries.verdict: A lot of people have said that the Merrell Vapor Glove 4 3D is the most comfortable trail running shoe they ever have worn. The credit is all due to the highly-praised 3D knit upper of the shoe. Several testers and experts have reported that this minimalist running shoe is highly durable to the extent that one runner used it for a marathon. The vegan-friendly quality of the Merrell Vapor Glove 4 3D is an added plus to a lot of people. Although there have been issues raised by a few users around the shoe lacing system, the overall reception of the shoe has been highly positive. Some wearers claim that they will surely get another pair of the Merrell Vapor Glove 4 3D.
pros: The Merrell Vapor Glove 4 3D’s foot-like shape has garnered numerous positive responses from different users
One of the features that received overwhelming approval from the testers and experts was the comfort that the shoe offers
Some of the reviewers praise the shoe’s versatility
it can be worn for everyday wear and as a workout companion
The shoe’s durability is lauded by several runners
A lot of the runners highly appreciate the sufficient protection provided by the shoe
One customer has noted the improvement on the shoe’s upper, which is now made of 3D knit
The flexibility that is promoted by the shoe is admired by a few users
cons: One runner complains that the Vapor Glove 4 3D has caused some blisters on foot
A reviewer has mentioned that the Hyperlock™ thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) heel counter was too stiff
When the shoe is tightened, the blood flow around the ankle is constricted, according to some wearers
The laces of the Vapor Glove 4 3D are too long, and they easily unravel, a few users remarked

customer_reviews.title: They are not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard soles for a barefoot shoe! I was really looking forward for its arrival but I was disappointed with the quality and the style. I only buy barefoot shoes and trainers and these are definitely the hardest I ever bought. Also, it's hard work to send them back!
customer_reviews.author: nick-jo

customer_reviews.title: Not Vibram Five Fingers
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and comfortable, and a good compromise if you don't want people pointing at your feet when you wear five fingers. But for running in comfort, they are simply not as comfortable as the excellent Vibram Five Fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. J. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to put on due to the solid heel. I had to buy a shoe horn. They are about a size bigger than most shoes. I’d also suggest they should cost less than half the price. My toe is damaged and I bought them for that reason. They are comfy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Justice Peace

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well fitting and I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of shoes. I get great comments and compliments all the time and they are super comfortable. They are zero drop and very thin soles so if you aren't used to that be careful, it might take some time to get used to. I love zero drop and bare foot type trainers and these are some of my favourites!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Donegan

customer_reviews.title: Too big. Buy a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: The seller really should warn you that it's best to buy a smaller size, especially as all the reviews are saying it - I wish I listened to them. I tried my best to wear them, but my foot left like it was falling off the sole. Eventually I sold them to someone with bigger feet.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE SLIM

customer_reviews.title: Good for specific purposes
customer_reviews.text: Basically a pair of socks with a thin rubber sole. Just what I wanted for squats and deadlifts at the gym. Not that comfortable for walking around generally though especially on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Try them if you like this type of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoe, comfortable,fair price. Delivered on time. I would recommend this product. Good for purpose,not everyone will suit these. Particular purpose shoe,I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave/fatape

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality Trainers, super comfortable, BUT buy at least half size smaller, I'm 8 UK and got 7.5, fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bademus

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable for summer
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and light and look amazing. I went for the orange ones and I’ve had lots of comments about them and they really turn heads. I bought them for the gym and have ended up wearing them constantly. They are great in many environments not just the gym including summer walks in the Forrest and around town. I will be buying another pair once needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Bull

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit great style Spot on for a barefoot shoe ... top price as well
customer_reviews.author: Martin Dobinson

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable but no good for rough or rocky ground
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bosomworth

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Grate comfy light shoes I would recommend it to all...
customer_reviews.author: Sonic style

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are like wearing a sock with a rubber sole. I dont think I could recommend these enough. These shoes are a MAJOR GO!!!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Ninja shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoes from Merrell as always. My fifth pair but the first time trying these guys out. Feel like a ninja! If you are a fan of the Nike free Flyknit 3.0 shoes, get these!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the gym. As a martial artist I like the barefoot feel. I love these shoes, very comfortable and you can really feel the floor with your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant quality - brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Made out of a sturdy material but very flexible. Great customer service from seller too.
customer_reviews.author: A Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable out of the box. I got the red and black and looks great. Will update once I run in them. Size seems true but will update that too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Michael

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Vapor Glove 4 3D Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Minimal look. Maximum performance. This barefoot shoe has a sock-like feel for a locked-down fit, plus a vibram sole with nearly zero ground-to-foot separation.
feature_bullets: 3D Knit Upper- 360 degree breathable, sock-like fit.
M-Select FRESH- Antimicrobial agents reduce shoe odour for a fresher for longer feeling.
Hyperlock TPU Film Heel Counter- Locked-in, secure feel.
Traditional Lace Up System- Adjustable fit for added security.
Moulded Nylon Arch Shank- Supportive structure diminishes load on feet and calves.
